name: Dale Bell
tagline: Writer, Benevolent Tyrant, and Ultimate IB Learner
description: Dale Bell is a determined journalist with only one goal, which he pursues tirelessly: getting the website trending. And also the truth or whatever.

name: Benjy Eichner
description: This role as Head Editor is the only way I have power over my Dungeon Master.

name: Caleb Levy
description: Dedicated to making queens from all the pawns. Every. Last. One.
